text.section:
The Secretary may establish a pilot farmstead cheese program after the Secretary:
Adopts regulations to implement the program; and
Issues a milk processor - farmstead cheese producer permit to a selected participant.

Subject to the availability of sufficient inspection and testing staff, equipment, and other resources, the Secretary may issue up to five milk processor - farmstead cheese producer permits under the pilot program.

To qualify for a milk processor - farmstead cheese producer permit the applicant shall:
Operate a dairy farm with no more than 120 cows or goats in the herd; and
Meet any other requirements established by the Department by regulation.
